structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Arrest On Mesne Process And Supplementary Proceedings In Civil Actions

law.text: If a person arrested on execution becomes an insolvent debtor under the laws of this commonwealth or a bankrupt under the laws of the United States, he shall be discharged upon his application to a district court in the county where the arrest was made, after such notice as the court shall order.
